com.versant.connector.jvi.nonmanaged
Class DefaultConnectionManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.connector.nonmanaged.AbstractConnectionManager
      com.versant.connector.jvi.nonmanaged.DefaultConnectionManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.resource.spi.ConnectionEventListener, javax.resource.spi.ConnectionManager
public class DefaultConnectionManagerImpl
extends com.versant.connector.nonmanaged.AbstractConnectionManager

DefaultConnectionManagerImpl provides an implementation of javax.resource.spi.ConnectionManager interface. It initializes the session pool based on the properties configured for the ManagedConnectionFactory. It also allocates the session from the session pool when requested by the application by calling getConnection method.

See Also:

getSessionPool

public SessionPool getSessionPool()
Returns the session pool.

Returns:
the session pool of type SessionPool.

releaseSession

public void releaseSession(FundSession session)
Releases a session from the pool. The session is released from the pool when the application level connection handle is closed.

Parameters:
session - of type FundSession which is to be released.
